name: Polymath Ventures
overview: Polymath is a ground-zero incubator designed for emerging economies. Polymath takes a new approach to incubation – a greenhouse – where the necessary tools and ingredients are housed under one roof. Polymath attracts talented individuals to form seed teams that identify genuine, widespread needs of people and develop powerful business solutions. Then it brings the right professionals and resources together to launch and scale profitable businesses – iterating and improving at every stage. Polymath’s mission is to encourage talented individuals to create and foster companies that can rapidly grow to serve the needs of the middle class in the developing world, employing thousands of people. These needs are vastly different than those of the developed countries, so innovation is a must. Ultimately, Polymath believes that building scalable companies is the foundation for economic growth.
